content.rendered:
When elementary school student Emily Elizabeth wants her little red dog to be big and strong, she doesn’t expect to wake up to find a four-foot-tall dog in her small New York apartment. Desperate to keep her beloved pet, Emily sets out to find a magical zookeeper who she hopes can restore Clifford to his original size. While roaming the city, word of Clifford’s size reaches the ears of an evil scientist who decides to touch the animal.

Director: Walt Becker

Writers: Jay Scherick. David Ronn. Blaise Hemingway

Stars: Darby Camp. Jack Whitehall. Izaac Wang
